item.description: Hello! Our next book for discussion will be "The Art of Happiness - A Handbook For Living" by His Holiness the Dalai Lama and Howard C. Cutler, M.D. (1998 - Riverhead Books). This very accessible book presents a series of interviews of the Dalai Lama by Dr. Cutler, a psychiatrist, and includes Dr. Cutler's reflections and stories illustrating different concepts. We hope you can join us to share your thoughts on this interesting book and on Buddhism. Look for a cafe table with a stack of books and a yellow sign that says "Book Discussion."
item.name: Next Book Discussion - Manchester Buddhism Sangha
